alert.note: Alert for Fairfield; Richland; Sumter (South Carolina) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued June 17 at 6:04PM EDT until June 17 at 7:00PM EDT by NWS Columbia
info.description: The National Weather Service in Columbia has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Southern Fairfield County in central South Carolina... West central Sumter County in central South Carolina... Central Richland County in central South Carolina... * Until 700 PM EDT. * At 603 PM EDT, a severe thunderstorm was located over Arcadia Lakes, or over Forest Acres, moving southeast at 10 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts and quarter size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Hail damage to vehicles is expected. Expect wind damage to trees and powerlines. * Locations impacted include... Columbia, Irmo, Forest Acres, Dentsville, St. Andrews, McEntire Air Base, Arcadia Lakes, Eastover, Woodfield, Sesquicentennial State Park, Fort Jackson, Columbia International University, Ballentine, Five Points, Horrel Hill, Killian, Harbison State Forest, Lake Murray Marina, Fort Jackson Wildcat Road and Upper Richland Fire Station. This includes the following highways... Interstate 20 in South Carolina between mile markers 65 and 81. Interstate 26 between mile markers 97 and 103. Interstate 77 between mile markers 9 and 24. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.00 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection seek shelter inside a sturdy building and stay away from windows.
